title: *PURCHASED* Paying Above VCP for Cobb Bat-off SGC-2 $2,000
author: GoBigRed

posts.post_title: *PURCHASED* Paying Above VCP for Cobb Bat-off SGC-2 $2,000
posts.post_content:
*PURCHASED*

Want to buy a SGC-2 New Label Bat-off version of the T206 Ty Cobb.

Will pay $2,000, pending scan review (above VCP of $1,750) ! !

May consider other Grades, but must be in the SGC New Label Slab.

Desire Centered and Nice-for- Grade example.

Steve
